meta.description: Language labels for the FE plugin Filelist (dr_blob) used to describe the plugin in the Plugin Wizard

languageKey.label: The dr_blob upload folder "%s" is a subfolder of the Typo3 Document Root Directory, so it may be accessible over the web
The dr_blob upload folder "%s" does not exist or is not writeable.
[<- back]
[reload this page]
Calculate not existing checksums
Search for tx_drblob_content-records having a file attached by no checksum (The checksum field was added in later versions of dr_blob):
Found %s records.
Should the updater fix these records?
(If you click "DO IT" the checksums will be calculated)
Fill empty author fields
Search for tx_drblob_content-records having an empty author-field and fill it based on the creator of the file. (In earlier versions the Backend-User that created the record was used as author):
Found %s records.
Should the updater add these values?
(If you click "DO IT" the author-value will be added to each row)
Search for outdated static TS templates
Search for TypoScript templates which include the dr_blob static template but with an outdated path:
Found %s template records.
Should the updater fix these records?
(If you click "DO IT" the updater script will update these template records with a fixed path)
Important! Please Read!
Nothing to do
Actions:
Update results:

The updater manipulates your database, which may be very big when using database stored files. The update process may take a long time. Please backup your database BEFORE hitting any of the "DO_IT" Buttons.
Plugin Mode: %s
and a "Personalize"-Button
with a vFolderTree
Filelist
Adds a list of downloadable files to the page
